metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11825 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Dolibarr 10.0.6, forms are protected with a CSRF token against CSRF attacks. The problem is any CSRF token in any user's session can be used in another user's session. CSRF tokens should not be valid in this situation.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
